document_data.name: ''Khamsin''
document_data.type: Magical poison{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|5}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Khamsin''''' was a potent magical [[poison]] sometimes used by [[Holy slayer]] [[assassin]]s of the [[Wind of Fate]] in [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Uses: ''Khamsin'' was a contact poison that was often applied to [[dart]]s. A deceitful way to use the poison was to apply it to the hilts of [[weapon]]s and offer them as gifts. Once skin contact with this poison was made, the victim literally turned to dust within minutes.
